user_query: I want to surprise my family with a special dinner tonight. Help me find a unique cocktail recipe that pairs well with seafood. Additionally, I need the sunset time and moon phase for tonight to create a romantic ambiance. Lastly, please recommend a good spot for stargazing near my location.

TaskList.description: Find a unique cocktail recipe that pairs well with seafood.
Get the sunset time for tonight at my location.
Get the moon phase for tonight.
Recommend a good spot for stargazing near my location.
